page.title: 11Wivelsfield - Farming (1)
page.content:
Although Wivelsfield is an area of {mixed farming,}the majority of the land is under cultivation.
Intensively managed grassland, both for pasture and for cutting as hay and silage, covers the most acreage.
Other crops grown are Winter and Spring Barley, Winter Wheat, Field Beans, Potatoes and Oats. Some of the crops are used to supplement livestock feed. Potatoes are often sold at the farms.
The fields are small to medium, some with hedgerows, but there are no large 'Prairie' type fields.
Almost all of the farms in the area have retained some woodland both coniferous and deciduous.
